data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 1, Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Throw-in Reims.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Reims.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Lorient.
Mikael Lesage signals a Reims throw-in in Lorient's half.
Moreto Cassama scores to make it 1-0 at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 15, That's a fine assist from Dereck Kutesa.
Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
Reims needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Can Lorient capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Reims's half?
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 19, Xavier Chavalerin for Reims has been booked by Mikael Lesage and receives a first yellow card.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
In the minute 21, Mikael Lesage awards Reims a goal kick.
Reims drive forward but Nathanael Mbuku is judged offside.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Reims drives forward and Mathieu Cafaro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 29, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lorient.
Lorient's Pierre-Yves Hamel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Reims defender.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Reims.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Reims to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 32, Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
Mikael Lesage signals a Lorient throw-in in Reims's half.
Free kick for Reims in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 33, Dereck Kutesa is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Pierre-Yves Hamel is booked for the away team.
In the minute 35, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Hugo Ekitike (Reims) has replaced the possibly injured Dereck Kutesa at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 36, Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Pierre-Yves Hamel for Lorient is whistled offside.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Lorient.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, In Reims Lorient attack through Yoane Wissa. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 44, Yoane Wissa (Lorient) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Mikael Lesage signals a Reims throw-in in Lorient's half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Reims.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Reims's Nathanael Mbuku gets in a shot on goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Reims's Hugo Ekitike has been booked in Reims.
Mikael Lesage has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Free kick Lorient.
David Guion (Reims) is making a second substitution, with Mouhamadou Drammeh replacing Xavier Chavalerin.
Important block from the Reims defence as Terem Moffi fires in a strike for Lorient.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Lorient.
Reims push forward at Stade Auguste Delaune and Hugo Ekitike gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lorient defence.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Lorient in the half of Reims.
Mouhamadou Drammeh (Reims) has received a yellow card from Mikael Lesage.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, Reims to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Free kick Lorient.
At Stade Auguste Delaune, Wout Faes has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 54, Lorient are pushing forward but Quentin Boisgard's finish is wide of the goal.
Mikael Lesage awards Reims a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 58, Lorient's Julien Laporte is whistled for offside at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 60, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Goal! Lorient go level at 1-1 through Pierre-Yves Hamel in Reims.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Lorient.
Throw-in high up the field for Reims in Reims.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Reims, close to Lorient's area.
In the minute 64, Lorient have been given a penalty at Stade Auguste Delaune...
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead thanks to a penalty from Yoane Wissa.
Reims drive upfield and Thomas Foket gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lorient defender.
In the minute 67, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moreto Cassama (Reims) has been shown a straight red card by referee Mikael Lesage.
Pierre-Yves Hamel is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Christophe Pelissier (Lorient) is making a first change, with Adrian Grbic replacing the possibly injured Pierre-Yves Hamel.
Moussa Doumbia is replacing Nathanael Mbuku for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 76, Christophe Pelissier is making the team's second substitution at Stade Auguste Delaune with Armand Lauriente replacing Quentin Boisgard.
The away team have replaced Trevoh Chalobah with Thomas Monconduit. This is the third substitution made today by Christophe Pelissier.
Hugo Ekitike of Reims gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In the minute 79, Reims have a goal kick.
Goal! Terem Moffi extends Lorient's lead to 1-3.
Armand Lauriente instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Kaj Sierhuis with Anastasios Donis.
In the minute 83, Lorient's Yoane Wissa misses with an attempt on goal.
Reims have a goal kick.
Fabien Lemoine is replacing Terem Moffi for Lorient at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 83, Christophe Pelissier is making the team's fifth substitution at Stade Auguste Delaune with Jonathan Delaplace replacing Laurent Abergel.
Throw-in Reims.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Mikael Lesage signals a Reims throw-in in Lorient's half.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Reims advance rapidly upfield but Mikael Lesage blows for offside.
In the minute 88, Lorient are coming forward and Adrian Grbic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Reims.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Lorient's Thomas Monconduit is back in action after a slight knock.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Reims are down to 10 men after Anastasios Donis has been shown a red card.
Attention is being given to Lorientâ€™s Thomas Monconduit and play has been suspended briefly.
